channel.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
channel.description:
which i think i allready am...
this is no lie.. and nobody knows it... NOBODY not even my parents, cibilings, peers, or anyone else.
your the first people to find out,
im not completely sure but im almost sure im OCD,
when ever i scratch my leg or something, i have to scratch the other leg in the same place or it bothers me for a while.
or if im filling the salt and peper shakers, the half to be completely even...
stuff like that.
ive been trying to fight it and it seems to work.
well... anything anyone wants to say?

item.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Lol, I kinda have that. If I touch one finger at the tip, I have to touch the rest. If I crack one knuckle, I have to crack the rest. If I don’t I feel weird.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!

item.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
item.dc:creator: @arraness14 arraness14
item.description:
@arraness14 wrote:

[quote=“bigmac, post:20, topic:15318”]i’m 14 and i have OCD with food.

I am so fussy! I won’t eat it unless i have seen it be prepared infront of me.[/quote]

and your name is bigmac…you dont know what they really put in those things…

EDIT: I might have bumped something old…sorry bout that

Read full topic
item.source: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!

when i hear a nail or anything scratching on paper im like haysoos not again

thats why i hate old books

item.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

I used to have it when I was younger. I grew out of it though.

Whenever the teacher was erasing something off the chalk board, and she missed a spot, I felt like I would die if that spot wasn’t erased.

Read full topic

item.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

I wouldn’t say they’re messed up. But they’re so over exaterated. I have a slight ocd (Self diagnosed so maybe I don’t) and I couldn’t care less about it. Lol when I’m playing grandtheftauto, I can’t stand to have the number of bullets at ending in anything other then 5 or 0, like if I have 99 bullets, I’ll shoot four out.

Its no biggie.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!

item.title: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

omg all of these so called “disorders” are just huge lies made up by drug companies I can control my “disorders” I have ad-hd and ocd but I have self-control and I can handle living normal. Think about it… when you get off the drugs your always twitching, really loud, or even naked… If you just learn to live with it you dont need to spend huge prices just to be normal.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to tell someone or ill go crazy!

FUCK SHIT.
